fire_dragon_boss.name: Ancient Fire Dragon
fire_dragon_boss.description: The legendary Ancient Fire Dragon, ruler of the mountains. Its breath can melt stone and its roar shakes the very earth.

special_abilities.name: Fire Breath
special_abilities.description: Deals massive fire damage to all enemies

special_abilities.name: Dragon Roar
special_abilities.description: Intimidates enemies, reducing their attack and defense

special_abilities.name: Wing Buffet
special_abilities.description: A powerful physical attack that may stun the enemy

phases.description: The dragon fights with typical draconic fury
Enraged by its wounds, the dragon becomes more aggressive
In its final moments, the dragon unleashes all its power

troll_king.name: Troll King
troll_king.description: The massive ruler of the underground tombs. Its enormous size and incredible strength make it a formidable opponent.

special_abilities.name: Earthquake Slam
special_abilities.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and potentially stunning the player

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.description: Rapidly heals a portion of its health

phases.description: The Troll King becomes more vicious as it takes damage

shadow_lord.name: Shadow Lord
shadow_lord.description: A mysterious entity of pure darkness that rules the deepest parts of the ancient ruins.

special_abilities.name: Shadow Strike
special_abilities.description: A lightning-fast attack that pierces all defenses

special_abilities.name: Dark Portal
special_abilities.description: Summons shadows to aid in battle

special_abilities.name: Soul Drain
special_abilities.description: Drains the player's life force to heal itself

phases.description: The Shadow Lord reveals its true power
Desperate and dangerous, the Shadow Lord uses all its dark powers

ice_queen.name: Ice Queen
ice_queen.description: The ethereal ruler of the Crystal Caves, she commands the power of eternal winter.

special_abilities.name: Blizzard
special_abilities.description: A magical attack that freezes the enemy, reducing their speed

special_abilities.name: Ice Shield
special_abilities.description: Creates a protective barrier that reduces incoming damage

special_abilities.name: Frost Nova
special_abilities.description: Releases a burst of freezing energy

phases.description: The Ice Queen becomes more aggressive in defense of her domain

orc_chieftain.name: Orc Chieftain
orc_chieftain.description: The brutal leader of the orc clan in the Deep Woods, wielding a massive war axe.

special_abilities.name: War Cry
special_abilities.description: Roars to boost its own attack and intimidate the enemy

special_abilities.name: Heavy Strike
special_abilities.description: A devastating blow that ignores some defense

phases.description: Wounded but still fierce, the Chieftain fights with increased desperation

empress_of_ice.name: The empress of ice Elara
empress_of_ice.description: A beautiful but deadly mage who rules the Crystal Caves with eternal winter.

void_tyrant.name: Void Tyrant Kael'dor
void_tyrant.description: An ancient being of cosmic horror that dwells beyond reality itself. The strongest challenge.
